<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GnuDebugLinkSection::init(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/objcopy/#a88eeb89876019c1a9f2540275fb96457a0b27918290ff5323bea1e3b78a9cf04e">File</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  FileName = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#aa56d25bb5127dd7a5831c25764f76cbe">sys::path::filename</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/objcopy/#a88eeb89876019c1a9f2540275fb96457a0b27918290ff5323bea1e3b78a9cf04e">File</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The format for the .gnu&#95;debuglink starts with the file name and is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// followed by a null terminator and then the CRC32 of the file. The CRC32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// should be 4 byte aligned. So we add the FileName size, a 1 for the null</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// byte, and then finally push the size to alignment and add 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(FileName.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>() + 1, 4) + 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The CRC32 will only be aligned if we align the whole section.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> = 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a822872b798744d6689b1b4cc615417a2">OriginalType</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf/#ab23570002b1ab10a685e8f349da3ddbca18ae5a64ac74a4265698b956bc797b32">ELF::SHT&#95;PROGBITS</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a6ca324c9086862d837e0593199d1e58e">Name</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.gnu&#95;debuglink&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For sections not found in segments, OriginalOffset is only used to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// establish the order that sections should go in. By using the maximum</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// possible offset we cause this section to wind up at the end.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/gnudebuglinksection/#a3b71f2bc7b412abf71f3a0d18e6d3261"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/gnudebuglinksection/#a3b71f2bc7b412abf71f3a0d18e6d3261">GnuDebugLinkSection::GnuDebugLinkSection</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/objcopy/#a88eeb89876019c1a9f2540275fb96457a0b27918290ff5323bea1e3b78a9cf04e">File</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1347"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adds sections from IHEX data file. Data should have been</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1348"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fully validated by this time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1349"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IHexELFBuilder::addDataSections() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/owneddatasection">OwnedDataSection</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/section">Section</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1351"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t SegmentAddr = 0, BaseAddr = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1352"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t SecNo = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1353"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1354"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/elf/ihexrecord">IHexRecord</a> &amp;R : Records) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1355"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t RecAddr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1356"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (R.Type) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1357"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/elf/ihexrecord/#a0edef690b68eda42710473270d9a0f35a9a50f8bf29974951a166212a08837edb">IHexRecord::Data</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1358"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ignore empty data records</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1359"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (R.HexData.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1360"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1361"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RecAddr = R.Addr + SegmentAddr + BaseAddr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1362"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/section">Section</a> || <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/section">Section</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#aaf9e58af43e8a65398a93a487d2bdb5f">Addr</a> + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/section">Section</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a6fefaf0cf6568001708fc6f9b862687a">Size</a> != RecAddr) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1363"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// OriginalOffset field is only used to sort sections before layout, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1364"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instead of keeping track of real offsets in IHEX file, and as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1365"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// layoutSections() and layoutSectionsForOnlyKeepDebug() use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1366"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// llvm::stable&#95;sort(), we can just set it to a constant (zero).</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2236"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each section that remains alive, we want to remove the dead references.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This either might update the content of the section (e.g. remove symbols</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from symbol table that belongs to removed section) or trigger an error if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2240"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a live section critically depends on a section being removed somehow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (e.g. the removed section is referenced by a relocation).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;KeepSec : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a341215803e83773a3e97860dc291f121">make&#95;range</a>(std::begin(Sections), Iter)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> E = KeepSec-&gt;removeSectionReferences(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2244"><span class="doxyHighlight">            AllowBrokenLinks, &#91;&amp;RemoveSections&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase">SectionBase</a> &#42;Sec) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2245"><span class="doxyHighlight">              return RemoveSections.find(Sec) != RemoveSections.end();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2246"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &#125;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2247"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> E;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2249"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Transfer removed sections into the Object RemovedSections container for use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2251"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// later.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2252"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::move(Iter, Sections.end(), std::back&#95;inserter(RemovedSections));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now finally get rid of them all together.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Sections.erase(Iter, std::end(Sections));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2256"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2258" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/object/#afbae322db16142a85112d588abe56eb7"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/object/#afbae322db16142a85112d588abe56eb7">Object::replaceSections</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;SectionBase &#42;, SectionBase &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;FromTo) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SectionIndexLess = &#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SecPtr &amp;Lhs, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SecPtr &amp;Rhs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2319"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2320"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Orders segments such that if x = y-&gt;ParentSegment then y comes before x.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2321" lineLink="#a5299c97aa0af6f626985eb7a5882746a"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a5299c97aa0af6f626985eb7a5882746a">orderSegments</a>(std::vector&lt;Segment &#42;&gt; &amp;Segments) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a076f93c387f454f0db13d4bc7d4e7f9c">llvm::stable&#95;sort</a>(Segments, <a href="#a5fc44e403374b7c21a88d67ffe88edc6">compareSegmentsByOffset</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2323"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2324"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2325"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function finds a consistent layout for a list of segments starting from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2326"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an Offset. It assumes that Segments have been sorted by orderSegments and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2327"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// returns an Offset one past the end of the last segment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2328" lineLink="#a57752aa0e0e6281fecc0fe16dc609cd5"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="#a57752aa0e0e6281fecc0fe16dc609cd5">layoutSegments</a>(std::vector&lt;Segment &#42;&gt; &amp;Segments,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2329"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a864e071375fea140a5441a243372ff81">llvm::is&#95;sorted</a>(Segments, <a href="#a5fc44e403374b7c21a88d67ffe88edc6">compareSegmentsByOffset</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2331"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The only way a segment should move is if a section was between two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// segments and that section was removed. If that section isn&#39;t in a segment</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then it&#39;s acceptable, but not ideal, to simply move it to after the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// segments. So we can simply layout segments one after the other accounting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2336"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment">Segment</a> &#42;Seg : Segments) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We assume that segments have been ordered by OriginalOffset and Index</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// such that a parent segment will always come before a child segment in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// OrderedSegments. This means that the Offset of the ParentSegment should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// already be set and we can set our offset relative to it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a47a40ff6267a0d5a1680e6564432a18c">ParentSegment</a> != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2342"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment">Segment</a> &#42;Parent = Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a47a40ff6267a0d5a1680e6564432a18c">ParentSegment</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2343"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#ac6c2aa733d3af071d31065d0090ff5c6">Offset</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2344"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Parent-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#ac6c2aa733d3af071d31065d0090ff5c6">Offset</a> + Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a7e21fcbce74455cf2bd3dd2eeeebacd5">OriginalOffset</a> - Parent-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a7e21fcbce74455cf2bd3dd2eeeebacd5">OriginalOffset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2345"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2346"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#ac6c2aa733d3af071d31065d0090ff5c6">Offset</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2347"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, std::max&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;(Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a7d4c0fbb1c341d6b45b7e7bf3c175477">Align</a>, 1), Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a88267282dde7a19f1b5fc3b8d75d2c6a">VAddr</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2349"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = std::max(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#ac6c2aa733d3af071d31065d0090ff5c6">Offset</a> + Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a5db1dbd2d6c37e72890bab3d1523d25d">FileSize</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2351"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2352"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2353"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2354"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function finds a consistent layout for a list of sections. It assumes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2355"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that the -&gt;ParentSegment of each section has already been laid out. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2356"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// supplied starting Offset is used for the starting offset of any section that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2357"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// does not have a ParentSegment. It returns either the offset given if all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2358"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sections had a ParentSegment or an offset one past the last section if there</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2359"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// was a section that didn&#39;t have a ParentSegment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2360"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Range&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2361" lineLink="#a782bd3507c3ce21c87bc884e7211afe3"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="#a782bd3507c3ce21c87bc884e7211afe3">layoutSections</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a> Sections, uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2362"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now the offset of every segment has been set we can assign the offsets</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2363"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of each section. For sections that are covered by a segment we should use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the segment&#39;s original offset and the section&#39;s original offset to compute</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2365"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the offset from the start of the segment. Using the offset from the start</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2366"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the segment we can assign a new offset to the section. For sections not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2367"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// covered by segments we can just bump Offset to the next valid location.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2368"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// While it is not necessary, layout the sections in the order based on their</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2369"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// original offsets to resemble the input file as close as possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;SectionBase &#42;&gt; OutOfSegmentSections;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2371"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t Index = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2372"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Sec : Sections) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2373"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Sec.Index = Index++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2374"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Sec.ParentSegment != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2375"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment">Segment</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment">Segment</a> = &#42;Sec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a47a40ff6267a0d5a1680e6564432a18c">ParentSegment</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2376"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Sec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#ac6c2aa733d3af071d31065d0090ff5c6">Offset</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2377"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment">Segment</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#ac6c2aa733d3af071d31065d0090ff5c6">Offset</a> + (Sec.OriginalOffset - <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment">Segment</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a7e21fcbce74455cf2bd3dd2eeeebacd5">OriginalOffset</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2378"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2379"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OutOfSegmentSections.push&#95;back(&amp;Sec);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2380"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2381"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a076f93c387f454f0db13d4bc7d4e7f9c">llvm::stable&#95;sort</a>(OutOfSegmentSections,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2383"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase">SectionBase</a> &#42;Lhs, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase">SectionBase</a> &#42;Rhs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2384"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Lhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a175b3cb20485be4d75ac2e380dd3dae8">OriginalOffset</a> &lt; Rhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a175b3cb20485be4d75ac2e380dd3dae8">OriginalOffset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2385"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2386"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Sec : OutOfSegmentSections) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2387"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, Sec-&gt;Align == 0 ? 1 : Sec-&gt;Align);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2388"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Sec-&gt;Offset = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2389"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Sec-&gt;Type != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf/#ab23570002b1ab10a685e8f349da3ddbca45212cec20bcd4ca3449dcd8654010ac">SHT&#95;NOBITS</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2390"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> += Sec-&gt;Size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2391"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2393"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2394"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2395"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rewrite sh&#95;offset after some sections are changed to SHT&#95;NOBITS and thus</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2396"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// occupy no space in the file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2397" lineLink="#a78ce20255776ffc35a2da78ba3f19892"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="#a78ce20255776ffc35a2da78ba3f19892">layoutSectionsForOnlyKeepDebug</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/object">Object</a> &amp;Obj, uint64&#95;t Off) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2398"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The layout algorithm requires the sections to be handled in the order of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2399"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// their offsets in the input file, at least inside segments.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2400"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;SectionBase &#42;&gt; Sections;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2401"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Sections.reserve(Obj.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/object/#a19d73e6ba4dbdb613614c9109fa0f1c6">sections</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectiontableref/#ae39c0033de705d12bff1c11d411d65b0">size</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2402"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t Index = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2403"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Sec : Obj.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/object/#a19d73e6ba4dbdb613614c9109fa0f1c6">sections</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2404"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Sec.Index = Index++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2405"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Sections.push&#95;back(&amp;Sec);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2406"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2407"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a076f93c387f454f0db13d4bc7d4e7f9c">llvm::stable&#95;sort</a>(Sections,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2408"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase">SectionBase</a> &#42;Lhs, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase">SectionBase</a> &#42;Rhs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2409"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Lhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a175b3cb20485be4d75ac2e380dd3dae8">OriginalOffset</a> &lt; Rhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a175b3cb20485be4d75ac2e380dd3dae8">OriginalOffset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2410"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2411"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2412"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Sec : Sections) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2413"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;FirstSec = Sec-&gt;ParentSegment &amp;&amp; Sec-&gt;ParentSegment-&gt;Type == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf/#a4c1b3bf29b3c86c8d11b6708ff244669a15ee14963e8cb0e95f10994bbd35a050">PT&#95;LOAD</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2414"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         ? Sec-&gt;ParentSegment-&gt;firstSection()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2415"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2416"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2417"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The first section in a PT&#95;LOAD has to have congruent offset and address</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2418"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// modulo the alignment, which usually equals the maximum page size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2419"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FirstSec &amp;&amp; FirstSec == Sec)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2420"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Off = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(Off, Sec-&gt;ParentSegment-&gt;Align, Sec-&gt;Addr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2421"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2422"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sh&#95;offset is not significant for SHT&#95;NOBITS sections, but the congruence</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2423"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// rule must be followed if it is the first section in a PT&#95;LOAD. Do not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2424"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// advance Off.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2425"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Sec-&gt;Type == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf/#ab23570002b1ab10a685e8f349da3ddbca45212cec20bcd4ca3449dcd8654010ac">SHT&#95;NOBITS</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2426"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Sec-&gt;Offset = Off;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2427"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2428"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2429"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2430"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!FirstSec) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2431"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FirstSec being nullptr generally means that Sec does not have the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2432"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SHF&#95;ALLOC flag.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2433"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Off = Sec-&gt;Align ? <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(Off, Sec-&gt;Align) : Off;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2434"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FirstSec != Sec) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2435"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The offset is relative to the first section in the PT&#95;LOAD segment. Use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2436"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sh&#95;offset for non-SHF&#95;ALLOC sections.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2437"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Off = Sec-&gt;OriginalOffset - FirstSec-&gt;OriginalOffset + FirstSec-&gt;Offset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2438"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2439"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Sec-&gt;Offset = Off;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2440"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Off += Sec-&gt;Size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2441"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2442"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Off;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2443"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2444"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2445"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rewrite p&#95;offset and p&#95;filesz of non-PT&#95;PHDR segments after sh&#95;offset values</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2446"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have been updated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2447" lineLink="#a7db0cfaec1a4fb39e28b687ff68dcaec"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="#a7db0cfaec1a4fb39e28b687ff68dcaec">layoutSegmentsForOnlyKeepDebug</a>(std::vector&lt;Segment &#42;&gt; &amp;Segments,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2451"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a5db127e6cf62bb2d7c9ced84cdbb8531">Type</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf/#a4c1b3bf29b3c86c8d11b6708ff244669af95333de0bb9b94266d0aef1869a4a17">PT&#95;PHDR</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2452"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2453"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2454"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The segment offset is generally the offset of the first section.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2455"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2456"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For a segment containing no section (see sectionWithinSegment), if it has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2457"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a parent segment, copy the parent segment&#39;s offset field. This works for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2458"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// empty PT&#95;TLS. If no parent segment, use 0: the segment is not useful for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2459"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// debugging anyway.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2460"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase">SectionBase</a> &#42;FirstSec = Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a721a11215fa5edc76768ad33f46064f0">firstSection</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2461"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2462"><span class="doxyHighlight">        FirstSec ? FirstSec-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a9ab60ac6df1d07f5866f34453f9efe15">Offset</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2463"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 : (Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a47a40ff6267a0d5a1680e6564432a18c">ParentSegment</a> ? <Link id="l02464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2464"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t FileSize = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2465"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase">SectionBase</a> &#42;Sec : Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#ae73f605c85ed9995737a565aa663bd3c">Sections</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2467"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Sec-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a9ab60ac6df1d07f5866f34453f9efe15">Offset</a> + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2469"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2470"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2471"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the segment includes EHDR and program headers, don&#39;t make it smaller</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2472"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// than the headers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2473"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#ac6c2aa733d3af071d31065d0090ff5c6">Offset</a> &lt; HdrEnd &amp;&amp; HdrEnd &lt;= Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> + Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a5db1dbd2d6c37e72890bab3d1523d25d">FileSize</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2474"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FileSize += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> - Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#ac6c2aa733d3af071d31065d0090ff5c6">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2476"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FileSize = std::max(FileSize, HdrEnd - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2477"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2480"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a5db1dbd2d6c37e72890bab3d1523d25d">FileSize</a> = FileSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2481"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MaxOffset = std::max(MaxOffset, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> + FileSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2482"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2493"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ElfHdr.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a7d4c0fbb1c341d6b45b7e7bf3c175477">Align</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2494"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2495"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2496"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ELFT&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ELFWriter&lt;ELFT&gt;::assignOffsets() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2497"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need a temporary list of segments that has a special order to it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2498"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so that we know that anytime -&gt;ParentSegment is set that segment has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2499"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// already had its offset properly set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2500"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;Segment &#42;&gt; OrderedSegments;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2501"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment">Segment</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment">Segment</a> : Obj.segments())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2502"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OrderedSegments.push&#95;back(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment">Segment</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2503"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OrderedSegments.push&#95;back(&amp;Obj.ElfHdrSegment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2504"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OrderedSegments.push&#95;back(&amp;Obj.ProgramHdrSegment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2505"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a5299c97aa0af6f626985eb7a5882746a">orderSegments</a>(OrderedSegments);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2506"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2507"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OnlyKeepDebug) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2509"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For --only-keep-debug, the sections that did not preserve contents were</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2510"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// changed to SHT&#95;NOBITS. We now rewrite sh&#95;offset fields of sections, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2511"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then rewrite p&#95;offset/p&#95;filesz of program headers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2512"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t HdrEnd =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2513"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Elf&#95;Ehdr) + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">llvm::size</a>(Obj.segments()) &#42; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Elf&#95;Phdr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2514"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="#a78ce20255776ffc35a2da78ba3f19892">layoutSectionsForOnlyKeepDebug</a>(Obj, HdrEnd);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2515"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = std::max(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2516"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      <a href="#a7db0cfaec1a4fb39e28b687ff68dcaec">layoutSegmentsForOnlyKeepDebug</a>(OrderedSegments, HdrEnd));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2517"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2518"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Offset is used as the start offset of the first segment to be laid out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2519"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since the ELF Header (ElfHdrSegment) must be at the start of the file,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2520"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we start at offset 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2521"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="#a57752aa0e0e6281fecc0fe16dc609cd5">layoutSegments</a>(OrderedSegments, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2522"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="#a782bd3507c3ce21c87bc884e7211afe3">layoutSections</a>(Obj.sections(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2523"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2524"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we need to write the section header table out then we need to align the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2525"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Offset so that SHOffset is valid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2526"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (WriteSectionHeaders)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2527"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Elf&#95;Addr));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2528"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Obj.SHOff = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2529"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2530"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2531"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ELFT&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ELFWriter&lt;ELFT&gt;::totalSize()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2532"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We already have the section header offset so we can calculate the total</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2533"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// size by just adding up the size of each section header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2534"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!WriteSectionHeaders)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2535"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Obj.SHOff;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2536"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShdrCount = Obj.sections().size() + 1; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Includes null shdr.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2537"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Obj.SHOff + ShdrCount &#42; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Elf&#95;Shdr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2538"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2640"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Before we can prepare for layout the indexes need to be finalized.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2643"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t Index = 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2730" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/binarywriter/#a5b9da0f3636f00c8eb9dca28bf21e606"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/binarywriter/#a5b9da0f3636f00c8eb9dca28bf21e606">BinaryWriter::finalize</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2731"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the section LMA based on its sh&#95;offset and the containing segment&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2732"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// p&#95;offset and p&#95;paddr. Also compute the minimum LMA of all non-empty</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2733"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sections as MinAddr. In the output, the contents between address 0 and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2734"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MinAddr will be skipped.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2735"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t MinAddr = <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#a30654b4b67d97c42ca3f9b6052dda916">UINT64&#95;MAX</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2736"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase">SectionBase</a> &amp;Sec : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/writer/#ad4df0d78579a2c7fae094d28ce9c3db8">Obj</a>.allocSections()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2737"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Sec.ParentSegment != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2738"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Sec.Addr =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2739"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Sec.Offset - Sec.ParentSegment-&gt;Offset + Sec.ParentSegment-&gt;PAddr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2740"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Sec.Type != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf/#ab23570002b1ab10a685e8f349da3ddbca45212cec20bcd4ca3449dcd8654010ac">SHT&#95;NOBITS</a> &amp;&amp; Sec.Size &gt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2741"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MinAddr = std::min(MinAddr, Sec.Addr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2742"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2743"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2744"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now that every section has been laid out we just need to compute the total</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2745"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// file size. This might not be the same as the offset returned by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2746"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// layoutSections, because we want to truncate the last segment to the end of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2747"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// its last non-empty section, to match GNU objcopy&#39;s behaviour.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2748"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TotalSize = PadTo &gt; MinAddr ? PadTo - MinAddr : 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2749"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase">SectionBase</a> &amp;Sec : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/writer/#ad4df0d78579a2c7fae094d28ce9c3db8">Obj</a>.allocSections())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2750"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Sec.Type != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf/#ab23570002b1ab10a685e8f349da3ddbca45212cec20bcd4ca3449dcd8654010ac">SHT&#95;NOBITS</a> &amp;&amp; Sec.Size &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2751"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Sec.Offset = Sec.Addr - MinAddr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2752"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TotalSize = std::max(TotalSize, Sec.Offset + Sec.Size);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2753"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2754"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2756"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/writer/#afa60fbd08f1b1c6a7b9ce0b1e16ce6cb">Buf</a>)</span></CodeLine>
